excerpt: "It takes AI kinds to make a virtual world. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said this week during a Q&A at the GTC22 online event that AI will auto-populate the 3D imagery of the metaverse. He believes that AI will make the first pass at creating the 3D objects that populate the vast virtual worlds of the metaverse â€” and then human creators will take over and refine them to their liking."
